text: Ian Bartholomew (born 23 August 1954) is a British actor from Cheshire, England who has worked widely in both theatre and television. In March 2018, Bartholomew joined the cast of the ITV soap opera, Coronation Street, as the abusive Geoff Metcalfe. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Hampshire Category:People from Portsmouth Category:Actors from Cheshire
title: Ian Bartholomew
